ing: 1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans (chickpeas), drained and rinsed
1/2 cup oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and cut into strips
des: "Easy and delicious salad, great for picnics. You may use cubed mozzarella instead of feta cheese."
ins: In a bowl, mix the garbanzo beans, sun-dried tomatoes, feta cheese, onion, garlic, and cilantro. In a separate bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, and salt, and pour over the salad. Refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving.
